label: Draft-night Trade: Kennedy Chandler rights
description: Memphis traded a 2024 LAL second-round pick to San Antonio for draft rights to Kennedy Chandler.

description: Memphis traded De'Anthony Melton to Philadelphia for Danny Green and draft rights to David Roddy.
